name: Website Scanning
description: The Website Vulnerability Scanner is a custom tool written by our team in order to quickly assess the security of a web application.It is a full-blown web application scanner.

name: Malware Removal
description: A virus removal is the process of manually or automatically deleting or disinfecting a computer virus, malware or other malicious program on a computing device.

name: Cloud Security
description: Cloud security, also known as cloud computing security, is a collection of security measures designed to protect cloud-based infrastructure, applications, and data.
